name: kalidokit
description: Kalidokit and cubism sdk testing area

scripts.build: npm run build:3d && npm run build:live2d
scripts.build:live2d: uglifyjs src/live2d/index.js -o public/live2d/index.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs src/live2d/utils/constants.js -o public/live2d/utils/constants.js

author: KarthikBharadwajS
